title: Expert Language Competency Development Program Utilizing Open Badge Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized training for medical/legal/technical professionals to enhance workplace communication skills, featuring VR simulations replicating actual job scenarios for practice-centered learning

learning_goals: Learners can perform language communication skills required in professional fields with over 80% accuracy via VR-based simulation.
Learners can visualize their language competencies and systematically organize them in a portfolio using digital open badges.
Learners can improve language performance by over 20% by incorporating feedback received through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
